message.body: Heya, Jurgen! How goes?
Hi, otherdeb! I just boarded the trolley to go to work, hoping to get a decent slab done today.
You?
Cool. I'm trying to write an article about the Periodic Table
As always, battling ADD . Couldn't get to bed till mumble o'clock
You don't happen to know when they started using colors for the various groups, do you?
Whoop, entering tunnel. Catch you in a little while, ok?
Bed? I'm still up from yesterday!
Yep
NFI
Uhhhhhh....
Out of tunnel, off trolley, back in. touch.
Lol
This article is making me bats
Colors: obvious suggestion: encyclopedia? And question: how common is coloring? how standard are colors?
You writing it? 4 what? Class? Publication?
Been looking all over the web - but you gave me ideas for two sectionsp
Web content
Work for hire
Ah. And me, I was hurrying to the office, but hey! This is for work! So I can sit here@a sidewalk table and drink my.latte.
Lol
Me, I'm drinking coffee at my computer
And seeing if the roomie can help me out (she's a retired reference librarian)
I just dl.ed "Periodic Table of Middle-Earth", w characters as the elements. The groups are races: Hobbits, Men, Elves, Orcs, etc.
The Dwarves are set as the rare earths :-(
Need to get this in by 3 pm, them finish editing a novel p
Aaaa I meant :-) !
LOL!
Would Love the link for that
& i've been a Tolkien need since 1964.
Yeah, this one-finger stuff is for kids with no arthritis!
Yiiiii! I better let you work then, ¿sí?
Sounds like about when I read the books, too
Eh, should be able to knock it out fairly quick
Only needs to be about 600 words
Don't have it on me. Google it. Re one finger, try Swype... Oh wait, are u on a reg. Computer or smartphone?
So no need to mention the colors at all, eh?
Registered smartphone
Oh, I need to talk about the colors - the keyword is "colored periodic table"
So. With Swype I just drag my finger across the keyboard, no tap-tap-tap. It puts up the word most likely for the path + an n-best list of other possibi
lities. And it learns.
Dunno how helpful this'd be, but try Google Images and see if you can get dates of publication for the colored ones.
Oh, I found your periodic table of middle-earth & sent it to my project mgr for a laugh
Good idea
3:00 seems like a bloody short deadline for something w that level of detail though
I have 2 questions for the PToME.
1. Where's 48?
Nah - 600 words isn't all that much
True!
And the other?
Its not the length I meant, but the research.
See Battle of the Pelennor Fields, the "epitaph" for Merry's sword.
Nah - I generally skim one or two articles to get data
OK, hope u can find what you need for this one in good time.
I'm gonna put this away for now & head on to the office, but we can pick it up any time till 10 a.m. tomorrow.
Ttfn
Oh, I have most of it - figured that when the colors were added could be one small section
Cool! Ttfn
Hihi
How was the rest of your day?
Got my article in on time
Me, I'm just getting up. ANOTHER 2am night. Feh
I'm glad you made your deadline, though.
It's primary day here. I have to vote before going to work.
Thx. Today I mostly need to finish editing a mss.
Mostly need coffee before doing anything
Oy. Good luck!
Me I gotta get myself vertical. Yeah, coffee will help. But first I have to get 2 the kitchen
This is funny/odd. I got a txt from my sis in Tx just now. 1st time I've ever bn in 2txt conversations @1ce
Yeah, I get that. Just got vertical myself.
(and it's not on her phone, only her computer, on an unfamiliar #, so I'm gonna hafta add that to my contact info 4 her)
Ah - I haven't gotten anything from the textbot yet today
I think at 10 it's gonna tell us time's up. so we're nearly done with this one, tho it may connect again in a few days 4 another 1.
rs, if the conversation starts on a Friday.
